alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 02 at 1:17PM MDT until October 03 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 3 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7,500 feet elevation. Total snow accumulations up to 7 inches above 7,500 feet elevation. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 3 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Back country recreation conditions will be cold and raw. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The most intense period of snow is expected to be between the hours of 6AM and noon. Snow may briefly mix in below 7,500 feet elevation, but is not expected to accumulate.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains
